abstract: Gmail offers a way to eliminate that suspicious-looking notation that says an e-mail message was sent “on behalf of” another account.
snippet: Gmail offers a way to eliminate that suspicious-looking notation that says an e-mail message was sent “on behalf of” another account.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:58 a.m. Corrected the “on behalf of” language displayed by Google.

headline.main: Finally, a Way to Hide Your Gmail Addiction
